title: Shishigari
synopsis: A gift from the gods of the mountains. Deep in the northern mountains, there are people who have been living with the blessings of the mountains. A boy, who is coming of age, journeys into the mountains for his first hunt. He must find the "Kuroshishi." The mountain is a world where life and death are divided by a paper-thin line. Sometimes, nature will show its fangs...
staff: [['Oshiyama, Kiyotaka', ['Director', ' Original Creator']], ['Kawai, Kenji', ['Music']], ['Kevin, Aymeric', ['Background Art']]]
